Lewis I've tried to be reasonable but
I'm not going to sit around and watch
this anymore as of this moment you're no
longer in charge of the associates it
says you in one Army I'm sorry I didn't
catch that I said you can't do that oh
yes I can because even though Harvey
clearly didn't tell you as of last night
I'm a senior partner you're what that's
right I gave Harvey a check for half a
million dollars I'm a partner now Lewis
which means your whole you're up here
and I'm down here not anymore
partner you're not even a lawyer neither
are the chief operating officers of four
of the top nine firms in the world this
is I didn't agree to any of
this I don't care whether you agreed to
it or not you're going to live with it
and I don't give a what your
supposed title is I'm not giving up my
associates and if you think you're going
to leave this bathroom without giving me
the respect I deserve I'm not giving up
my associates that's enough Harvey what
the hell kind of did you pull shut
up and listen Lewis don't ask for a seat
at the table and I gave her one because
when she worked for me she had my back
and would kill anyone coming from me and
when she worked for you she did the same
exact thing not to mention if she left
tomorrow this firm would be a pile of
rubble within 15 minutes so then give
her a raise you don't make her goddamn
senior partner if Jessica were here she
tell you to do the same exact thing will
Lewis Jessica isn't here
but I am
thank you Harvey don't thank me yet you
asked for a vote you got it
but the person who's going to decide
when that vote is is me and I say our
first order of business is putting out
word that Harvey Specter is the new
managing partner now you want to vote on
that let's do it but if it's not
unanimous we're gonna have a big problem

no problem here
